sum_fields.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  =================================
00002 !
00003 !    3D gather for DC fields
00004 !  =================================
00005 
00006 subroutine sum_fields
00007 
00008   use physvars
00009   use treevars
00010 
00011   implicit none
00012 
00013   real :: rdx, rdy, rdz, dx, dy, dz, cweight, jxweight, jyweight, jzweight
00014   real :: tweight, exweight, eyweight, ezweight
00015 
00016   real :: fx1, fx2, fy1, fy2, fz1, fz2, xa, ya, za, gamma, fr1, fr2
00017   integer :: i, j, k, ng, i1, i2, j1, j2, k1, k2, jfoc, kfoc, nelecs, nions
00018   character(30) :: cfile
00019   character(5) :: cme
00020   character(6) :: cdump, cvis
00021   real, dimension(0:ngx+1,0:ngy+1,0:ngz+1) :: ex_w, ey_w, ez_w
00022   real, dimension(0:ngx+1,0:ngy+1,0:ngz+1) :: bx_w, by_w, bz_w
00023   real :: gmin=1.e-3
00024 
00025   dx = xl/ngx
00026   dy = yl/ngy
00027   dz = zl/ngz
00028   rdx = 1./dx
00029   rdy = 1./dy
00030   rdz = 1./dz
00031 
00032   do k=1,ngz
00033      do j=1,ngy
00034         do i=1,ngx
00035            ex_w(i,j,k) = 0.
00036            ey_w(i,j,k) = 0.
00037            ez_w(i,j,k) = 0.
00038            bx_w(i,j,k) = 0.
00039            by_w(i,j,k) = 0.
00040            bz_w(i,j,k) = 0.
00041            g_ion(i,j,k) = 0.
00042            g_ele(i,j,k) = 0.
00043            rhoi_loc(i,j,k) = 0.
00044            rhoe_loc(i,j,k) = 0.
00045            jxe_loc(i,j,k)=0.
00046            jye_loc(i,j,k)=0.
00047            jze_loc(i,j,k)=0.
00048            te_loc(i,j,k) = 0.
00049            ti_loc(i,j,k) = 0.
00050         end do
00051      end do
00052   end do
00053 
00054   !  field box limits: (0-xl, 0-yl, 0-zl)
00055   !  Any particle outside gets put in ghost cells 0, ngx+1
00056 
00057   !      write(15,'(//a,3f12.3)') 'cw,dx,dy',cweight,dx,dy
00058 
00059 
00060   do i=1,npp
00061 
00062      xa=x(i)*rdx
00063      ya=y(i)*rdy
00064      za=z(i)*rdz
00065 
00066      !  indices
00067      i1=xa+1
00068      i2=i1+1
00069      j1=ya+1
00070      j2=j1+1
00071      k1=za+1
00072      k2=k1+1
00073 
00074      i1 = min(max(0,i1),ngx+1)
00075      i2 = min(max(0,i2),ngx+1)
00076      j1 = min(max(0,j1),ngy+1)
00077      j2 = min(max(0,j2),ngy+1)
00078      k1 = min(max(0,k1),ngz+1)
00079      k2 = min(max(0,k2),ngz+1)
00080 
00081      !  linear weighting
00082      fx2=min(max(i1-xa,0.),1.)  ! Prevent overflow/negative weighting for particles outside box
00083      fx1=1.-fx2
00084      fy2=min(max(j1-ya,0.),1.)
00085      fy1=1.-fy2
00086      fz2=min(max(k1-za,0.),1.)
00087      fz1=1.-fz2
00088      !  gather charge at nearest grid points
00089      gamma = sqrt(1.0+ux(i)**2+uy(i)**2+uz(i)**2)
00090      cweight = abs(q(i))*rdx*rdy*rdz       ! charge weighting factor
00091 
00092      jxweight = cweight*ux(i)/gamma
00093      jyweight = cweight*uy(i)/gamma
00094      jzweight = cweight*uz(i)/gamma
00095      tweight = (gamma-1.)  ! K.E. of particle in keV
00096      fr1 = sqrt(fx1**2+fy1**2+fz1**2+eps**2)
00097      fr2 = sqrt(fx2**2+fy2**2+fz2**2+eps**2)
00098 
00099 
00100      if (q(i)<0) then
00101         g_ele(i1,j1,k1)=g_ele(i1,j1,k1) + fx1*fy1*fz1  ! weighted # electrons
00102         g_ele(i2,j1,k1)=g_ele(i2,j1,k1) + fx2*fy1*fz1
00103         g_ele(i1,j2,k1)=g_ele(i1,j2,k1) + fx1*fy2*fz1
00104         g_ele(i2,j2,k1)=g_ele(i2,j2,k1) + fx2*fy2*fz1
00105         g_ele(i1,j1,k2)=g_ele(i1,j1,k2) + fx1*fy1*fz2
00106         g_ele(i2,j1,k2)=g_ele(i2,j1,k2) + fx2*fy1*fz2
00107         g_ele(i1,j2,k2)=g_ele(i1,j2,k2) + fx1*fy2*fz2
00108         g_ele(i2,j2,k2)=g_ele(i2,j2,k2) + fx2*fy2*fz2
00109 
00110         rhoe_loc(i1,j1,k1)=rhoe_loc(i1,j1,k1) + cweight*fx1*fy1*fz1
00111         rhoe_loc(i2,j1,k1)=rhoe_loc(i2,j1,k1) + cweight*fx2*fy1*fz1
00112         rhoe_loc(i1,j2,k1)=rhoe_loc(i1,j2,k1) + cweight*fx1*fy2*fz1
00113         rhoe_loc(i2,j2,k1)=rhoe_loc(i2,j2,k1) + cweight*fx2*fy2*fz1
00114         rhoe_loc(i1,j1,k2)=rhoe_loc(i1,j1,k2) + cweight*fx1*fy1*fz2
00115         rhoe_loc(i2,j1,k2)=rhoe_loc(i2,j1,k2) + cweight*fx2*fy1*fz2
00116         rhoe_loc(i1,j2,k2)=rhoe_loc(i1,j2,k2) + cweight*fx1*fy2*fz2
00117         rhoe_loc(i2,j2,k2)=rhoe_loc(i2,j2,k2) + cweight*fx2*fy2*fz2
00118 
00119         jxe_loc(i1,j1,k1)=jxe_loc(i1,j1,k1) + jxweight*fx1*fy1*fz1
00120         jxe_loc(i2,j1,k1)=jxe_loc(i2,j1,k1) + jxweight*fx2*fy1*fz1
00121         jxe_loc(i1,j2,k1)=jxe_loc(i1,j2,k1) + jxweight*fx1*fy2*fz1
00122         jxe_loc(i2,j2,k1)=jxe_loc(i2,j2,k1) + jxweight*fx2*fy2*fz1
00123         jxe_loc(i1,j1,k2)=jxe_loc(i1,j1,k2) + jxweight*fx1*fy1*fz2
00124         jxe_loc(i2,j1,k2)=jxe_loc(i2,j1,k2) + jxweight*fx2*fy1*fz2
00125         jxe_loc(i1,j2,k2)=jxe_loc(i1,j2,k2) + jxweight*fx1*fy2*fz2
00126         jxe_loc(i2,j2,k2)=jxe_loc(i2,j2,k2) + jxweight*fx2*fy2*fz2
00127 
00128         jye_loc(i1,j1,k1)=jye_loc(i1,j1,k1) + jyweight*fx1*fy1*fz1
00129         jye_loc(i2,j1,k1)=jye_loc(i2,j1,k1) + jyweight*fx2*fy1*fz1
00130         jye_loc(i1,j2,k1)=jye_loc(i1,j2,k1) + jyweight*fx1*fy2*fz1
00131         jye_loc(i2,j2,k1)=jye_loc(i2,j2,k1) + jyweight*fx2*fy2*fz1
00132         jye_loc(i1,j1,k2)=jye_loc(i1,j1,k2) + jyweight*fx1*fy1*fz2
00133         jye_loc(i2,j1,k2)=jye_loc(i2,j1,k2) + jyweight*fx2*fy1*fz2
00134         jye_loc(i1,j2,k2)=jye_loc(i1,j2,k2) + jyweight*fx1*fy2*fz2
00135         jye_loc(i2,j2,k2)=jye_loc(i2,j2,k2) + jyweight*fx2*fy2*fz2
00136 
00137         jze_loc(i1,j1,k1)=jze_loc(i1,j1,k1) + jzweight*fx1*fy1*fz1
00138         jze_loc(i2,j1,k1)=jze_loc(i2,j1,k1) + jzweight*fx2*fy1*fz1
00139         jze_loc(i1,j2,k1)=jze_loc(i1,j2,k1) + jzweight*fx1*fy2*fz1
00140         jze_loc(i2,j2,k1)=jze_loc(i2,j2,k1) + jzweight*fx2*fy2*fz1
00141         jze_loc(i1,j1,k2)=jze_loc(i1,j1,k2) + jzweight*fx1*fy1*fz2
00142         jze_loc(i2,j1,k2)=jze_loc(i2,j1,k2) + jzweight*fx2*fy1*fz2
00143         jze_loc(i1,j2,k2)=jze_loc(i1,j2,k2) + jzweight*fx1*fy2*fz2
00144         jze_loc(i2,j2,k2)=jze_loc(i2,j2,k2) + jzweight*fx2*fy2*fz2
00145 
00146         Te_loc(i1,j1,k1)=Te_loc(i1,j1,k1) + tweight*fx1*fy1*fz1
00147         Te_loc(i2,j1,k1)=Te_loc(i2,j1,k1) + tweight*fx2*fy1*fz1
00148         Te_loc(i1,j2,k1)=Te_loc(i1,j2,k1) + tweight*fx1*fy2*fz1
00149         Te_loc(i2,j2,k1)=Te_loc(i2,j2,k1) + tweight*fx2*fy2*fz1
00150         Te_loc(i1,j1,k2)=Te_loc(i1,j1,k2) + tweight*fx1*fy1*fz2
00151         Te_loc(i2,j1,k2)=Te_loc(i2,j1,k2) + tweight*fx2*fy1*fz2
00152         Te_loc(i1,j2,k2)=Te_loc(i1,j2,k2) + tweight*fx1*fy2*fz2
00153         Te_loc(i2,j2,k2)=Te_loc(i2,j2,k2) + tweight*fx2*fy2*fz2
00154 
00155      else
00156         g_ion(i1,j1,k1)=g_ion(i1,j1,k1) + fx1*fy1*fz1  ! weighted # ions
00157         g_ion(i2,j1,k1)=g_ion(i2,j1,k1) + fx2*fy1*fz1
00158         g_ion(i1,j2,k1)=g_ion(i1,j2,k1) + fx1*fy2*fz1
00159         g_ion(i2,j2,k1)=g_ion(i2,j2,k1) + fx2*fy2*fz1
00160         g_ion(i1,j1,k2)=g_ion(i1,j1,k2) + fx1*fy1*fz2
00161         g_ion(i2,j1,k2)=g_ion(i2,j1,k2) + fx2*fy1*fz2
00162         g_ion(i1,j2,k2)=g_ion(i1,j2,k2) + fx1*fy2*fz2
00163         g_ion(i2,j2,k2)=g_ion(i2,j2,k2) + fx2*fy2*fz2
00164 
00165         rhoi_loc(i1,j1,k1)=rhoi_loc(i1,j1,k1) + cweight*fx1*fy1*fz1
00166         rhoi_loc(i2,j1,k1)=rhoi_loc(i2,j1,k1) + cweight*fx2*fy1*fz1
00167         rhoi_loc(i1,j2,k1)=rhoi_loc(i1,j2,k1) + cweight*fx1*fy2*fz1
00168         rhoi_loc(i2,j2,k1)=rhoi_loc(i2,j2,k1) + cweight*fx2*fy2*fz1
00169         rhoi_loc(i1,j1,k2)=rhoi_loc(i1,j1,k2) + cweight*fx1*fy1*fz2
00170         rhoi_loc(i2,j1,k2)=rhoi_loc(i2,j1,k2) + cweight*fx2*fy1*fz2
00171         rhoi_loc(i1,j2,k2)=rhoi_loc(i1,j2,k2) + cweight*fx1*fy2*fz2
00172         rhoi_loc(i2,j2,k2)=rhoi_loc(i2,j2,k2) + cweight*fx2*fy2*fz2
00173        ! ion temp
00174         Ti_loc(i1,j1,k1)=Ti_loc(i1,j1,k1) + tweight*fx1*fy1*fz1
00175         Ti_loc(i2,j1,k1)=Ti_loc(i2,j1,k1) + tweight*fx2*fy1*fz1
00176         Ti_loc(i1,j2,k1)=Ti_loc(i1,j2,k1) + tweight*fx1*fy2*fz1
00177         Ti_loc(i2,j2,k1)=Ti_loc(i2,j2,k1) + tweight*fx2*fy2*fz1
00178         Ti_loc(i1,j1,k2)=Ti_loc(i1,j1,k2) + tweight*fx1*fy1*fz2
00179         Ti_loc(i2,j1,k2)=Ti_loc(i2,j1,k2) + tweight*fx2*fy1*fz2
00180         Ti_loc(i1,j2,k2)=Ti_loc(i1,j2,k2) + tweight*fx1*fy2*fz2
00181         Ti_loc(i2,j2,k2)=Ti_loc(i2,j2,k2) + tweight*fx2*fy2*fz2
00182 
00183      endif
00184      ! Electric field - use ngp, softened 1/r^2 weight
00185      ex_w(i1,j1,k1)=ex_w(i1,j1,k1) + Ex(i)/fr1**2
00186      ey_w(i1,j1,k1)=ey_w(i1,j1,k1) + Ey(i)/fr1**2
00187      ez_w(i1,j1,k1)=ez_w(i1,j1,k1) + Ez(i)/fr1**2
00188      bz_w(i1,j1,k1)=bz_w(i1,j1,k1) + Bz(i)/fr1**2 ! B-field
00189 
00190      !        phig(i1,j1,k1)=phig(i1,j1,k1) + phi(i)/fr1
00191 
00192   end do
00193 
00194   ! normalise averaged quantities
00195   nelecs = SUM(g_ele(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz))
00196   nions = SUM(g_ion(1:ngx,1:ngy,1:ngz))
00197   if (debug_level>1) write(ipefile,*) 'density integrals: ',nelecs, nions
00198   g_ele = max(gmin,g_ele)
00199   g_ion = max(gmin,g_ion)
00200   Te_loc = .511*Te_loc   ! Temperature in MeV (KE per particle)
00201   Ti_loc = .511*mass_ratio*Ti_loc   ! K.E. in MeV
00202 
00203   Ex_loc = Ex_loc + ex_w/(g_ion+g_ele)/navcycle    ! Accumulate normalised fields
00204   Ey_loc = Ey_loc + ey_w/(g_ion+g_ele)/navcycle
00205   Ez_loc = Ez_loc + ez_w/(g_ion+g_ele)/navcycle
00206 
00207   Bz_loc = bz_w/(g_ion+g_ele)  ! Instantaneous B
00208 
00209 ! laser fields
00210 
00211 end subroutine sum_fields
